Title: WPF 3D Labyrinth
Description: A project for "Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms" subject at Kaunas University of Technology. Building a 3D labyrinth with a figure which is trying to get out of it. Using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Short description

A project for "Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms" subject at Kaunas University of Technology. Building a 3D labyrinth with a figure which is trying to get out of it. Using WPF.

About the project

That's a second project we're doing at the university this semester. Most of the technologies (WPF, WPF, VS2010) we're using on this project are the same, so it's good to improve out knowlage. It's still not an easy task (to build a 3D labyrinth with 3D figure moving through it) since we had never worked with a 3D.
